author: Staff Reporter
text:
Demanding that the public distribution outlet that was shifted from their locality be relocated to the same place, residents of Ward 59 picketed the Primary Agriculture Cooperative Society in Erumapalayam here on Wednesday.

The outlet was functioning in Third Street of Perumal Kovil Medu with over 500 card holders. On Wednesday, residents found the workers transporting the provisions from the shop. They were shocked to learn that the shop was moved to a place at Seelanaickenpatti. Ward councillor Murugan along with over 50 residents picketed the society office. Society president Sengodan said that the outlet was till now functioning in a rented building and the owner had asked to vacate it immediately.
title: Residents oppose relocation of ration shop
